message.raw:
Remove suggestion to install packages via 'web'. Pip can now handle binary
packages just fine, is the standard method of distribution, and comes with
Python, so there is no need for web installers anymore.

Add configparser dependency - this is the backported 'configparser' module from
Python 3.5 for Python 2. On Python 3 this check succeeds due to the stdlib module,
so no need to make the check version-specific.
Align output of installer when checking depdencies. Makes it easier to read.
